alert.note: Alert for Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 20 at 10:20PM MST until December 21 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST WEDNESDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM WEDNESDAY TO NOON PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations between 1 and 3 inches. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 25 to 30 below zero. * WHERE...Soldiers Meadow Road, Nezperce, Winchester, Kamiah, and Craigmont. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 4 AM PST Wednesday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 7 PM Wednesday to Noon PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday morning commute. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing and drifting snow will be possible early Wednesday morning and afternoon with cold and gusty northerly winds increase.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties
